modName: Main Menu plus Combat and Boss Music Replacer.
summary: I changed the Main menu,Combat and Boss Music to a more suitable genre for me anyway, this is a personal choice, but thought I would share with all of you.
descriptionHtml:
Main Menu, Combat, and Boss music replacer, the band is ANGELMAKER the songs are taken from their album "Decay" yes its the whole album, and some other surprises by them :) and they can be found here https://www.facebook.com/angelmakerband . I have permission to post these songs in this format.

Granted this music isn't for everyone but its for me, and a select few others , if you like it please share , and feel free to stop by their page and say hello.

You can download Manually and copy and paste into your Skyrim folder or use Nexus Manager.

If you install Manually, make sure you back up the existing intro music first, renaming works in case this isn't your cup if tea.

And I would also like to thank Sparrow Prince for his Smoking Hot Main Menu Mod, which adds nicely to this one, he can be found here http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52236/?0


NOTE!!... It works may take awhile to start cycling through but its been tested:) Just hang back and play it loud.
author: Vile208
